Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-47554 affecting package apache-commons-io for versions less than 2.14.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-47554 affecting package apache-commons-io for versions less than 2.14.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package apache-commons-io is earlier than 2.14.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-47554
